definitions: The action or process of shaping an object by pouring a liquid into a mold.
The process of selecting actors for a play, film, or other production.
The act of throwing something, especially a fishing line or net.
The shedding of skin, antlers, or other outer covering by an animal.
examples: The foundry specializes in casting intricate metal parts.
The director is currently casting for the lead role.
He spent the afternoon casting his line into the river.
The snake was casting its old skin.
